# User Journeys

This document illustrates the key user journeys through the Ogent platform, showing how different user personas interact with the system.

## Key User Personas

The Ogent platform serves various user types with different needs and permission levels:

1. **System Administrator**: Manages the entire system, configures settings, and has full access to all features
2. **DevOps Engineer**: Uses the platform to manage infrastructure and automate operations
3. **Developer**: Uses the platform for development tasks and debugging
4. **Support Staff**: Uses the platform to assist users and troubleshoot issues
5. **Read-Only User**: Has view-only access to the system for monitoring purposes

## Authentication Journey

## Command Execution Journey (DevOps Engineer)

This diagram shows the journey a DevOps Engineer follows to execute commands on target systems.

<div class="mermaid-container">
  <iframe src="https://mermaid.live/view#eyJjb2RlIjoiZmxvd2NoYXJ0IFREXG4gICAgTG9naW5bXCJMb2dpbiAmIEF1dGhlbnRpY2F0aW9uXCJdIC0tPiBTZWxlY3Rpb25bXCJUYXJnZXQgU2VsZWN0aW9uXCJdXG4gICAgU2VsZWN0aW9uIC0tPiBQcmVwYXJhdGlvbltcIkNvbW1hbmQgUHJlcGFyYXRpb25cIl1cbiAgICBQcmVwYXJhdGlvbiAtLT4gRXhlY3V0aW9uW1wiQ29tbWFuZCBFeGVjdXRpb25cIl1cbiAgICBFeGVjdXRpb24gLS0-IFJldmlld1tcIlJlc3VsdCBSZXZpZXdcIl1cbiAgICBcbiAgICBSZXZpZXcgLS0-IERlY2lzaW9uUG9pbnQxe1wiU3VjY2Vzc2Z1bD9cIn1cbiAgICBcbiAgICBEZWNpc2lvblBvaW50MSAtLT58WWVzfCBTaGFyZVtcIlNoYXJlIFJlc3VsdHMgd2l0aCBUZWFtXCJdXG4gICAgRGVjaXNpb25Qb2ludDEgLS0-fE5vfCBBbmFseXplW1wiQW5hbHl6ZSBFcnJvcnNcIl1cbiAgICBcbiAgICBBbmFseXplIC0tPiBEZWNpc2lvblBvaW50MntcIkZpeCBhdmFpbGFibGU_XCJ9XG4gICAgRGVjaXNpb25Qb2ludDIgLS0-fFllc3wgTW9kaWZ5W1wiTW9kaWZ5IENvbW1hbmRcIl1cbiAgICBEZWNpc2lvblBvaW50MiAtLT58Tm98IEVzY2FsYXRlW1wiRXNjYWxhdGUgSXNzdWVcIl1cbiAgICBcbiAgICBNb2RpZnkgLS0-" style="width:100%; height:500px; border:0; border-radius: 4px;" title="Command Execution Journey"></iframe>
</div>

**Key Journey Steps:**
1. **Login & Authentication** - DevOps engineer logs into the Ogent platform
2. **Target Selection** - User selects target systems for command execution
3. **Command Preparation** - User prepares the command to be executed
4. **Command Execution** - System executes the command across selected targets
5. **Result Review** - User reviews the output and status of the command
6. **Follow-up Actions** - User takes appropriate actions based on results

This journey illustrates the typical workflow for DevOps engineers using the Ogent platform to manage infrastructure through command execution.

## System Administration Journey

This diagram shows the typical tasks and workflow for a System Administrator working with the Ogent platform.

<div class="mermaid-container">
  <iframe src="https://mermaid.live/view#eyJjb2RlIjoiZmxvd2NoYXJ0IFRCXCAgICBzdGFydFtcIkxvZ2luXCJdIC0tPiBEYXNoYm9hcmRbXCJWaWV3IERhc2hib2FyZFwiXVxuICAgIFxuICAgIERhc2hib2FyZCAtLT4gVXNlck1hbmFnZW1lbnRbXCJVc2VyIE1hbmFnZW1lbnRcIl1cbiAgICBEYXNoYm9hcmQgLS0-IFRhcmdldE1hbmFnZW1lbnRbXCJUYXJnZXQgU3lzdGVtIE1hbmFnZW1lbnRcIl1cbiAgICBEYXNoYm9hcmQgLS0-IFNlY3VyaXR5W1wiU2VjdXJpdHkgTWFuYWdlbWVudFwiXVxuICAgIERhc2hib2FyZCAtLT4gTG9nc1tcIkxvZ3MgJiBBdWRpdHNcIl1cbiAgICBcbiAgICBVc2VyTWFuYWdlbWVudCAtLT4gQWRkVXNlcltcIkFkZCBVc2VyXCJdXG4gICAgVXNlck1hbmFnZW1lbnQgLS0-IEVkaXRVc2VyW1wiRWRpdCBVc2VyXCJdXG4gICAgVXNlck1hbmFnZW1lbnQgLS0-IERpc2FibGVVc2VyW1wiRGlzYWJsZSBVc2VyXCJdXG4gICAgVXNlck1hbmFnZW1lbnQgLS0-IFJPTE1hbmFnZW1lbnRbXCJSb2xlIE1hbmFnZW1lbnRcIl1cbiAgICBcbiAgICBTZWN1cml0eSAtLT4gUGFzc3dvcmRQb2xpY3lbXCJQYXNzd29yZCBQb2xpY3lcIl1cbiAgICBTZWN1cml0eSAtLT4gMkZBW1wiMkZBIFNldHRpbmdzXCJdXG4gICAgU2VjdXJpdHkgLS0-IEFQSVNLW1wiQVBJIEtleSBNYW5hZ2VtZW50XCJdXG4gICAgU2VjdXJpdHkgLS0-IEFjY2Vzc0NvbnRyb2xbXCJBY2Nlc3MgQ29udHJvbFwiXVxuICAgIFxuICAgIFRhcmdldE1hbmFnZW1lbnQgLS0--" style="width:100%; height:500px; border:0; border-radius: 4px;" title="System Administration Journey"></iframe>
</div>

**Key Administration Tasks:**
1. **User Management** - Creating, modifying, and removing user accounts
2. **Role Configuration** - Setting up access roles and permissions
3. **System Monitoring** - Tracking system health and performance
4. **Security Management** - Managing security settings and compliance
5. **Maintenance Operations** - Performing regular system maintenance

This journey showcases the various administrative paths available to System Administrators managing the Ogent platform.

## Developer User Journey

This diagram illustrates how developers interact with the Ogent platform for development, testing, and system integration.

<div class="mermaid-container">
  <iframe src="https://mermaid.live/view#eyJjb2RlIjoiZmxvd2NoYXJ0IFRCXCAgICBzdGFydFtcIkxvZ2luXCJdIC0tPiBEYXNoYm9hcmRbXCJWaWV3IERhc2hib2FyZFwiXVxuICAgIFxuICAgIERhc2hib2FyZCAtLT4gRGV2RW52W1wiQWNjZXNzIERldmVsb3BtZW50IEVudmlyb25tZW50XCJdXG4gICAgRGFzaGJvYXJkIC0tPiBUYXNrc1tcIlZpZXcgQXNzaWduZWQgVGFza3NcIl1cbiAgICBEYXNoYm9hcmQgLS0-IERvY3NbXCJBY2Nlc3MgRG9jdW1lbnRhdGlvblwiXVxuICAgIERhc2hib2FyZCAtLT4gTG9nc1tcIkNoZWNrIEFwcGxpY2F0aW9uIExvZ3NcIl1cbiAgICBcbiAgICBEZXZFbnYgLS0-IENvZGVbXCJXcml0ZS9FZGl0IENvZGVcIl1cbiAgICBEZXZFbnYgLS0-IFRlc3RbXCJSdW4gVGVzdHNcIl1cbiAgICBEZXZFbnYgLS0-IERlYnVnW1wiRGVidWcgSXNzdWVzXCJdXG4gICAgRGV2RW52IC0tPiBDb21taXRbXCJDb21taXQgQ2hhbmdlc1wiXVxuICAgIFxuICAgIFRhc2tzIC0tPiBUYXNrRGV0YWlsc1tcIlZpZXcgVGFzayBEZXRhaWxzXCJdXG4gICAgVGFza3MgLS0-IFVwZGF0ZVRhc2tbXCJVcGRhdGUgVGFzayBTdGF0dXNcIl1cbiAgICBUYXNrcyAtLT4gQXNzaWdubWVudFtcIk1hbmFnZSBBc3NpZ25tZW50c1wiXVxuICAgIFxuICAgIFRlc3QgLS0-IERlY2lzaW9uUG9pbnR7XCJUZXN0cyBQYXNzP1wifVxuICAgIERlY2lzaW9uUG9pbnQgLS0-" style="width:100%; height:500px; border:0; border-radius: 4px;" title="Developer User Journey"></iframe>
</div>

**Key Developer Activities:**
1. **Accessing Development Environment** - Logging in and accessing development tools
2. **Code Development** - Writing and testing code in development environments
3. **Integration Testing** - Verifying integration with other system components
4. **Deployment Testing** - Testing deployment processes and scripts
5. **Performance Analysis** - Analyzing system performance and optimizing code

This journey highlights the typical workflow for developers as they use the Ogent platform to develop, test, and refine application components.

## Support Staff User Journey

This diagram shows how support staff interact with the Ogent platform to address user issues and provide assistance.

<div class="mermaid-container">
  <iframe src="https://mermaid.live/view#eyJjb2RlIjoiZmxvd2NoYXJ0IFRCXCAgICBzdGFydFtcIkxvZ2luXCJdIC0tPiBEYXNoYm9hcmRbXCJWaWV3IFN1cHBvcnQgRGFzaGJvYXJkXCJdXG4gICAgXG4gICAgRGFzaGJvYXJkIC0tPiBUaWNrZXRzW1wiVmlldyBTdXBwb3J0IFRpY2tldHNcIl1cbiAgICBEYXNoYm9hcmQgLS0-IERvY3NbXCJBY2Nlc3MgS25vd2xlZGdlIEJhc2VcIl1cbiAgICBEYXNoYm9hcmQgLS0-IExvZ3NbXCJDaGVjayBTeXN0ZW0gTG9nc1wiXVxuICAgIERhc2hib2FyZCAtLT4gVXNlcnNbXCJWaWV3IFVzZXIgSW5mb1wiXVxuICAgIFxuICAgIFRpY2tldHMgLS0-IFRpY2tldERldGFpbHNbXCJWaWV3IFRpY2tldCBEZXRhaWxzXCJdXG4gICAgVGlja2V0cyAtLT4gQXNzaWduVGlja2V0W1wiQXNzaWduIFRpY2tldFwiXVxuICAgIFRpY2tldHMgLS0--IENsb3NlVGlja2V0W1wiQ2xvc2UgVGlja2V0XCJdXG4gICAgXG4gICAgRXNjYWxhdGUgLS0-" style="width:100%; height:500px; border:0; border-radius: 4px;" title="Support Staff User Journey"></iframe>
</div>

**Key Support Activities:**
1. **Ticket Management** - Reviewing and processing support tickets
2. **Issue Investigation** - Investigating reported problems
3. **User Assistance** - Providing guidance and solutions to users
4. **Problem Escalation** - Escalating complex issues to appropriate teams
5. **Knowledge Base Management** - Updating documentation based on support cases

This journey outlines the typical workflow for support personnel helping users resolve issues with the Ogent platform.

## Multi-User Collaboration Flow

This diagram illustrates how different user roles collaborate within the Ogent platform to address complex scenarios such as deployment issues.

<div class="mermaid-container">
  <iframe src="https://mermaid.live/view#-T0c6IFJlcG9ydCBkZXBsb3ltZW50IGlzc3VlXG4gICAgT0ctPj5TQTogTm90aWZ5IG9mIHJlcG9ydGVkIGlzc3VlXG4gICAgU0EtPj5ERTogQXNzaWduIGlzc3VlIGludmVzdGlnYXRpb25cbiAgICBcbiAgICBERS0-Pk9HOiBJbnZlc3RpZ2F0ZSB0YXJnZXQgc3lzdGVtXG4gICAgT0ctPj5ERTogUmV0dXJuIHN5c3RlbSBkaWFnbm9zdGljc1xuICAgIFxuICAgIERFLT4-U0E6IFJlcXVlc3QgYWRkaXRpb25hbCBhY2Nlc3NcbiAgICBTQS0-PkRFOiBHcmFudCB0ZW1wb3JhcnkgYWRtaW4gYWNjZXNzXG4gICAgXG4gICAgREUtPj5ERVc6IENvbnN1bHQgb24gY29kZSBpc3N1ZVxuICAgIERFVi0-PkRFOiBQcm92aWRlIGNvZGUgaW5zaWdodHNcbiAgICBcbiAgICBERS0-Pk9HOiBSdW4gZml4IHNjcmlwdFxuICAgIE9HLT4-REU6IFJldHVybiBmaXggcmVzdWx0c1xuICAgIFxuICAgIERFLT4-U0E6IFJlY29tbWVuZCBzeXN0ZW0gdXBkYXRlXG4gICAgU0EtPj5PRzogQXBwcm92ZSBhbmQgc2NoZWR1bGUgdXBkYXRlXG4gICAgT0ctPj5TQTogVXBkYXRlIGNvbXBsZXRlZFxuICAgIFxuICAgIFNBLT4-U1U6IE5vdGlmeSBvZiBmaXhcbiAgICBTVS0-Pk9HOiBWZXJpZnkgc29sdXRpb25cbiAgICBTVS0-" style="width:100%; height:500px; border:0; border-radius: 4px;" title="Multi-User Collaboration Flow"></iframe>
</div>

**Key Collaboration Elements:**
1. **Cross-Role Communication** - Communication between different user roles
2. **Issue Escalation Path** - Clear pathways for escalating complex problems
3. **Knowledge Sharing** - Mechanisms for sharing solutions and expertise
4. **Collaborative Problem Solving** - Joint approach to addressing system issues
5. **Resolution Documentation** - Recording solutions for future reference

This sequence diagram demonstrates how system administrators, developers, and support staff collaborate to identify, diagnose, and resolve deployment issues within the Ogent platform.

## Additional Journeys

The user journeys shown above represent the primary interactions with the Ogent platform. Additional journeys may be added as the system evolves, including:

- Read-Only User Journey
- Auditor User Journey
- External API Integration Journey
- Notification Response Journey

These diagrams help visualize how different users interact with the Ogent platform, ensuring that the system design addresses the needs of all stakeholders and supports their workflows effectively.
